isomorphic-fetch

Fetch for node and Browserify. Built on top of GitHubâ€™s WHATWG Fetch polyfill.

Warnings

  • This adds fetch as a global so that its API is consistent between client and server.
  • You must bring your own ES6 Promise compatible polyfill, I suggest es6-promise.

Installation

NPM

npm install --save isomorphic-fetch es6-promise

Bower

bower install --save isomorphic-fetch es6-promise

Usage

require('es6-promise').polyfill();
require('isomorphic-fetch');

fetch('//offline-news-api.herokuapp.com/stories')
    .then(function(response) {
        if (response.status >= 400) {
            throw new Error("Bad response from server");
        }
        return response.json();
    })
    .then(function(stories) {
        console.log(stories);
    });
